paradox.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a situation that seems strange because it involves two ideas or qualities that are very different

paradox.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a statement that seems impossible because it contains two opposing ideas that are both true
paradox.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The paradox is that fishermen would catch more fish if they fished less.
paradox.translation[0].definitions[2].de: the use of statements that are a paradox in writing or speech
